pageSetting.title: 行员在线评分得分明细

sqlMap.select: /**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select case when b.jflx='1' then '打分者权重计分' when b.jflx='2' then '打分者平均得分' when b.jflx='3' then '打分者平均得分（去掉一个最高分，一个最低分）' when b.jflx='4' then '在权重比例内再取人员平均（去掉一个最高分，一个最低分）' when b.jflx='5' then '在权重比例内再取人员平均' when b.jflx='6' then '打分者平均得分（去掉两个最高分，两个最低分）' end jflx ,c.dxlxmc,case when b.qzzb>0 then F_NUMTOCHAR(b.qzzb)||'%' else '' end qzzb,avg(b.pf) pjdf ,F_GET_STRZXPFPY(a.khdx,a.fabh,a.khqs,a.khdxdh,b.jflx,b.pfdxlx) as pyhz from KHFA_ZXPFFA a inner join KHFA_ZXPFZ b on a.fabh=b.fabh and a.khqs=b.khqs and a.pjr=b.pjr and a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh inner join CSB_PFLX c on b.pfdxlx=c.pfdxlx and c.sykhdx=b.khdx inner join csb_sjw d on 1=1 and d.tjrq=$tjrq$ and d.tjrq=(case when a.khzq=3 then d.nm when a.khzq=2 then d.jm else d.ym end) where 1=1 and b.fabh=$fabh$ and a.khdxdh= $khdxdh$ and b.khzbdh=$khzbdh$ and a.pfzt='1' and a.khdx='2' and b.pf is not null and a.khqs=(case when a.khzq=1 then cast(substr(cast(d.tjrq as char(8)),5,2) as integer) when a.khzq=2 then cast(cast(substr(cast(d.tjrq as char(8)),5,2) as integer)/3 as integer) else cast(substr(cast(d.tjrq as char(8)),1,4) as integer) end) group by a.khdx,a.fabh,a.khqs,a.khdxdh,b.jflx,b.pfdxlx,c.dxlxmc,b.qzzb

/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select case when b.jflx='1' then '打分者权重计分' when b.jflx='2' then '打分者平均得分' when b.jflx='3' then '打分者平均得分（去掉一个最高分，一个最低分）' when b.jflx='4' then '在权重比例内再取人员平均（去掉一个最高分，一个最低分）' when b.jflx='5' then '在权重比例内再取人员平均' when b.jflx='6' then '打分者平均得分（去掉两个最高分，两个最低分）' end jflx ,c.dxlxmc,case when b.qzzb>0 then F_NUMTOCHAR(b.qzzb)||'%' else '' end qzzb,avg(b.pf) pjdf ,F_GET_STRZXPFPY(a.khdx,a.fabh,a.khqs,a.khdxdh,b.jflx,b.pfdxlx) as pyhz from KHFA_ZXPFFA a inner join KHFA_ZXPFZ b on a.fabh=b.fabh and a.khqs=b.khqs and a.pjr=b.pjr and a.khdxdh=b.khdxdh inner join CSB_PFLX c on b.pfdxlx=c.pfdxlx and c.sykhdx=b.khdx inner join csb_sjw d on 1=1 and d.tjrq=$tjrq$ and d.tjrq=(case when a.khzq=3 then d.nm when a.khzq=2 then d.jm else d.ym end) where 1=1 and b.fabh=$fabh$ and a.khdxdh= $khdxdh$ and b.khzbdh=$khzbdh$ and a.pfzt='1' and a.khdx='2' and b.pf is not null and a.khqs=(case when a.khzq=1 then cast(substr(cast(d.tjrq as char(8)),5,2) as integer) when a.khzq=2 then cast(cast(substr(cast(d.tjrq as char(8)),5,2) as integer)/3 as integer) else cast(substr(cast(d.tjrq as char(8)),1,4) as integer) end) group by a.khdx,a.fabh,a.khqs,a.khdxdh,b.jflx,b.pfdxlx,c.dxlxmc,b.qzzb ) t
